examples: They are egalitarian, have no great chiefs and tend to share and share alike.
And their one- to two-dozen dog packs are surprisingly egalitarian.
In its earliest incarnations, Islam was unusually egalitarian, especially for its time.
Dr. Joseph Guillotine, the inventor of the guillotine, envisioned it as an egalitarian way of dying.
Marx’s criticism of capitalism is that capitalism replaces this egalitarian collaboration with conflict.
words.defineEn: supporting the notion that all humans are equal and should be given equal rights
words.defineVi: ủng hộ quan điểm rằng tất cả mọi người đều bình đẳng và nên được trao quyền bình đẳng

examples: Writing a dissertation within a week is a herculean task.
Developing a complex software program from scratch within a tight deadline is a herculean task for the development team.
To accomplish this herculean task, the xylem relies on three forces: transpiration, capillary action, and root pressure.
We have plenty of doses to share with the world, but this is a Herculean logistical challenge.
And that’s, I think, what he’ll be known for, this kind of Herculean effort not to roll over on Obama, to keep those 140 seats.
words.defineEn: extremely difficult; requiring the strength of a Hercules
words.defineVi: cực kỳ khó khăn; đòi hỏi sức mạnh của một Hercules

examples: Instead of an anonymous possible goddess, Manet gives us a Parisian prostitute with a name and a direct gaze.
The beheading in October of Parisian teacher Samuel Paty by a Chechen Islamist was the catalyst for change.
She had been imprisoned for her activities as an Allied spy, but with the help of a screwdriver and two other prisoners, she was back under the Parisian stars.
In 1792 the Parisian masses, threatened by the approach of foreign royal armies, took extreme action.
The first virophage, named Sputnik, was discovered in 2008 by a team of French researchers in a Parisian water tower.
words.defineEn: of or relating to or characteristic of Paris or its inhabitants
words.defineVi: của, liên quan đến hoặc đặc điểm của Paris hoặc cư dân của nó

words.defineEn: (used of the voice or sound) deep and resonant
words.defineVi: (được sử dụng với giọng nói hoặc âm thanh) sâu và vang

examples: - Your burgers are gargantuan.
Mosher: Space Launch System is this gargantuan rocket that will actually take the astronauts into orbit around Earth and a bunch of the equipment they need to go up there, too.
The Disneyland turkey leg is a time-honored tradition of eating a gargantuan hunk of meat on a stick.
But mega-malls' gargantuan size coupled with an unsustainable rate of construction would lead to the collapse of the mall itself.
The women's tournament only looks small in comparison to the gargantuan $1 billion in revenue that the men's tournament brings in.
words.defineEn: of great mass; huge and bulky
words.defineVi: có khối lượng lớn; khổng lồ và cồng kềnh

examples: The vocabulary, grammar, and syntax of Tolkien's invented languages, even of Quenya and Sindarin, are far too incomplete to allow its casual, conversational, or quotidian use.
words.defineEn: taking place every day and thus considered as an ordinary occurrence
words.defineVi: diễn ra hàng ngày và do đó được coi là một sự xuất hiện bình thường
được sử dụng trong cuộc vui say rượu náo loạn

words.defineEn: inclined to change in form, nature, etc. frequently
words.defineVi: có xu hướng thay đổi thường xuyên về hình thức, tính chất, v.v.

examples: I just wanna feel the controller that supposedly is so advanced and game changing that they couldn't allow, like, plebeian PlayStation 4 controllers to work in PS5 games.
words.defineEn: of or associated with the great masses of people
words.defineVi: của hoặc liên quan đến khối lượng lớn của người dân

examples: Wace added another centerpiece of Arthurian lore to Geoffrey’s sword, castle, and wizard: the Round Table.
words.defineEn: of or relating to King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table
words.defineVi: của hoặc liên quan đến Vua Arthur và Hiệp sĩ Bàn tròn

examples: You see a willful ignorance.
Former Governor Rick Snyder is facing misdemeanor counts of willful neglect.
Trying brings willful control into the mix, and that’s opposite to the spontaneous nature of inspiration.
He pleaded not guilty this morning to two misdemeanor charges of willful neglect of duty.
Mary always made sure to be truthful and transparent in her personal relationships, knowing that honesty was the foundation of trust and respect.
That's not even truthful.
That's not even truthful.
And you just have to be honest, open, truthful.
Because I'm being truthful and I'll always be truthful.
words.defineEn: (of a person or statement) honest and truthful
words.defineVi: (của một người hoặc tuyên bố) trung thực và trung thực

examples: It's really regretful that this has become a partizan issue, because I would think that folks, no matter which political party they support, want fair and secure elections.
For each, you have to choose one adjective from a set of four that Baron-Cohen provides: Is this pair of eyes despondent, preoccupied, cautious, or regretful?
words.defineEn: feeling or expressing regret or sorrow or a sense of loss over something done or undone
words.defineVi: cảm thấy hoặc thể hiện sự hối tiếc hoặc buồn bã hoặc cảm giác mất mát về một cái gì đó được thực hiện hoặc hoàn tác

examples: But if they don't - like lets say a parent doesn't take you to the hospital or the doctor when you're sick, that's neglectful.
And a constant state of urgency and catch-up makes you extremely inefficient and neglectful of things that are really important.
He came from a neglectful home and sustained permanent damage to the front of his mouth.
Meaning we will date or become friends with someone, Who is very similar to our neglectful or abusive caregiver.
And that is by us recreating these hurtful and neglectful relationships from our past.
words.defineVi: thất bại trong những gì nhiệm vụ yêu cầu

examples: The old jump out from behind a corner trick or using sound to set a more generally frightful mood.
The key is you just say dreadful, frightful, and quite.
As the father of two teenage children, I look at all you've achieved in a frightful world, and it gives me great hope.
My gallery is very much under construction, and came with a frightful assortment of partially painted walls, which I’m going to do something about don’t worry.
